Description: Unique Identifier for a particular event.
Timestamp indicating when the event was captured.
Sequence number of the event. The sequence is assigned by the virtual assistant. The virtual assistant increments the number for every event created by it on that device.
Unique id given to a particular persona. It is a categorical variable. Not same as participant. Use only when persona id is asked or used in the question.
Id of the participant involved in the event. Also refered to as participant or user. Not same as persona.
Id of the application on the device.

This represents the values of different types of process and non-process. (All applications with values not equal to zero are process applications):Non-process applications: 0 ,Desktop or native applications: 2 ,Browser-based applications: 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, or 8 ,Java-based applications: 9 ,Mainframe applications: 10 or 11 ,Web extension-based applications: 100 and larger
Total number of updates made to the clipboard since the previous event up to the current event.
Title of the current window while capturing the event.
Date indicating when the event was captured.
Total count of navigation keys pressed from previous event up to the current event.
Total count of numeric keys pressed from previous event up to the current event.
Total count of mouse clicks from previous event up to the current event.
Total count of mouse wheel movements from previous event upto the current event.
Total count of alphabets pressed from previous event to this event.
